overview: At a corporate party, Katerina made a bad laugh at her rival. As a result, waking up in the morning, she cannot remember anything, and, judging by the traces left in the apartment, she spent the night with a man. But with what?  Later, Katerina discovers that she is pregnant. And then the chef can not do without her. For her help, he is even ready to come with documents to her home in order to prepare a major international contract.
title: Otets ponevole
